IONIAN SEA.
VESSEL AL BUSHARA, TEN PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND
ADRIFT IN 38-59-49.0N 017-28-42.5E AT 081200Z MAR.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737 OR MRSC PALERMO,
PHONE: 390 9160 4311, FAX: 390 9132 5519.
